POOF.content: the hyperbole of an extreme middle in Aristotle, moderation, proper measure: this applies to # of friends & ‘threshold of tolerance’ re: border btwn pólis and ethnos

OH.content: Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself
OH.linkedContent: Europe advances itself as heading for universal essence of man > to advance oneself: to name oneself, rush out ahead, in front, anticipate, launch, stick one’s neck out, to love or to violate, to love to violate, to colonize, colonize itself

WAP.content: the way “Kant” possibilizes [new discourse/pedagogy], while being destined to this [modern] turn, informs European “culture,” i.e. “colonization”: philosopher as judge/truth teller
WAP.linkedContent: the way “Kant” possibilizes [new discourse/pedagogy], while being destined to this [modern] turn, informs European “culture,” i.e. “colonization”: philosopher as judge/truth teller

WAP.content: history of decolonization & deconstruction, double bind of reappropriating & refusal > how to do something other than overturn (renverser) and (thus) reappropriate?
WAP.linkedContent: history of decolonization & deconstruction, double bind of reappropriating & refusal > how to do something other than overturn (renverser) and (thus) reappropriate?

WAP.content: to identity historical concatenation of deconstruction & decolonization is to use a conceptual resource of history no longer self-evident
WAP.linkedContent: to identity historical concatenation of deconstruction & decolonization is to use a conceptual resource of history no longer self-evident

WAP.content: philosophy, deconstruction of philosophy, and decolonization are interminable, pushed to its extreme limit, where it is interminable, decolonization cannot import, interiorize, model of another State or even the style of their deconstruction (model/reality of their crisis), for there is no one deconstruction
WAP.linkedContent: philosophy, deconstruction of philosophy, and decolonization are interminable, pushed to its extreme limit, where it is interminable, decolonization cannot import, interiorize, model of another State or even the style of their deconstruction (model/reality of their crisis), for there is no one deconstruction

WAP.content: there are only singular, idiomatic, heterogenous styles, strategies of deconstruction unique to each situation > essential to account for this irreducible heterogeneity
WAP.linkedContent: there are only singular, idiomatic, heterogenous styles, strategies of deconstruction unique to each situation > essential to account for this irreducible heterogeneity

WAP.content: il n’y a pas le choix, a political theme: every monolingualism restores mastery
WAP.linkedContent: il n’y a pas le choix, a political theme: every monolingualism restores mastery

WAP.content: unity of language always vested and manipulated simulacrum, a positivist dogma and, à la fois, a phenomenon that can be found nowhere > so: play, graft between languages, w/in the languages in language, thus we can struggle against colonizing principle
WAP.linkedContent: unity of language always vested and manipulated simulacrum, a positivist dogma and, à la fois, a phenomenon that can be found nowhere > so: play, graft between languages, w/in the languages in language, thus we can struggle against colonizing principle

WAP.content: crisis of crisis [beyond nationalistic alibi] lies there where we can’t trust unity of “properly European” or “properly African”
WAP.linkedContent: crisis of crisis [beyond nationalistic alibi] lies there where we can’t trust unity of “properly European” or “properly African”

WAP.content: overturning (renversement) authorized hierarchy not enough, not enough to canonize minor texts or devalue major texts
